verses.text: \w Then|strong="H8085"\w* Elisha \w said|strong="H1697"\w*, “\w Hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*! \w This|strong="H3541"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: ‘\w About|strong="H1697"\w* \w this|strong="H3541"\w* \w time|strong="H6256"\w* \w tomorrow|strong="H4279"\w* \w at|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* seah \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w fine|strong="H5560"\w* \w flour|strong="H5560"\w* \f + \fr 7:1 \ft A seah is approximately 6.6 dry quarts or 7.3 liters (probably about 8.2 pounds or 3.7 kilograms of flour); here and in verses 16 and 18.\f* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* sell \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w shekel|strong="H8255"\w*,\f + \fr 7:1 \ft A shekel is approximately 0.4 ounces or 11.4 grams, probably of silver; here and in verses 16 and 18.\f* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* two \w seahs|strong="H5429"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w barley|strong="H8184"\w* \f + \fr 7:1 \ft 2 seahs is approximately 13.2 dry quarts or 14.6 liters (probably about 19.3 pounds or 8.8 kilograms of barley); here and in verses 16 and 18.\f* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* sell \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w shekel|strong="H8255"\w*.’”

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w officer|strong="H7991"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w whose|strong="H8033"\w* \w arm|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w leaned|strong="H8172"\w* \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w man|strong="H2088"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, “\w Look|strong="H7200"\w*, \w even|strong="H3808"\w* \w if|strong="H2005"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w make|strong="H6213"\w* windows \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*, \w could|strong="H2088"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w really|strong="H2088"\w* \w happen|strong="H1961"\w*?” “\w You|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w own|strong="H1961"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*,” \w replied|strong="H6030"\w* Elisha, “\w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* eat \w any|strong="H6213"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w*.” The Syrians Flee

\w Now|strong="H1961"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* four men \w with|strong="H3427"\w* leprosy \f + \fr 7:3 \ft Leprosy was a term used for various skin diseases; here and in verse 8; see Leviticus 13.\f* \w at|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w entrance|strong="H6607"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w city|strong="H8179"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w*, \w and|strong="H3427"\w* \w they|strong="H5704"\w* said \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w one|strong="H1961"\w* \w another|strong="H7453"\w*, “\w Why|strong="H4100"\w* just \w sit|strong="H3427"\w* \w here|strong="H6311"\w* \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*?

If \w we|strong="H3068"\w* say, ‘\w Let|strong="H6258"\w* \w us|strong="H2421"\w* \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \w into|strong="H3212"\w* \w the|strong="H8033"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*,’ \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H5892"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w from|strong="H3212"\w* \w the|strong="H8033"\w* \w famine|strong="H7458"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H8033"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*; \w but|strong="H6258"\w* if \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w sit|strong="H3427"\w* \w here|strong="H6311"\w*, \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H5892"\w* \w also|strong="H4191"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*. \w So|strong="H4191"\w* \w come|strong="H3212"\w* \w now|strong="H6258"\w*, \w let|strong="H6258"\w* \w us|strong="H2421"\w* \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \w over|strong="H5307"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w the|strong="H8033"\w* \w camp|strong="H4264"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H8033"\w* Arameans. If \w they|strong="H8033"\w* \w let|strong="H6258"\w* \w us|strong="H2421"\w* \w live|strong="H3427"\w*, \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H5892"\w* \w live|strong="H3427"\w*; if \w they|strong="H8033"\w* \w kill|strong="H4191"\w* \w us|strong="H2421"\w*, \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H5892"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H6965"\w* \w they|strong="H8033"\w* \w arose|strong="H6965"\w* \w at|strong="H4264"\w* \w twilight|strong="H5399"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w went|strong="H6965"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w camp|strong="H4264"\w* \w of|strong="H4264"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* Arameans. \w But|strong="H2009"\w* \w when|strong="H5704"\w* \w they|strong="H8033"\w* came \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w outskirts|strong="H7097"\w* \w of|strong="H4264"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w camp|strong="H4264"\w*, \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w was|strong="H4264"\w* \w not|strong="H5704"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* man \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w be|strong="H5399"\w* found.

\w For|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* Lord \w had|strong="H3478"\w* caused \w the|strong="H5921"\w* Arameans \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w sound|strong="H6963"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w*, \w horses|strong="H5483"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w army|strong="H2428"\w*, \w so|strong="H8085"\w* \w that|strong="H8085"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w said|strong="H8085"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w one|strong="H8085"\w* another, “\w Look|strong="H2009"\w*, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w must|strong="H3478"\w* \w have|strong="H3478"\w* \w hired|strong="H7936"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Hittites|strong="H2850"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w Egyptians|strong="H4714"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* attack \w us|strong="H5921"\w*.”

Thus \w the|strong="H6965"\w* Arameans \w had|strong="H4264"\w* \w arisen|strong="H6965"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w fled|strong="H5127"\w* \w at|strong="H4264"\w* \w twilight|strong="H5399"\w*, abandoning \w their|strong="H5800"\w* \w tents|strong="H4264"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w horses|strong="H5483"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w donkeys|strong="H2543"\w*. \w The|strong="H6965"\w* \w camp|strong="H4264"\w* \w was|strong="H1931"\w* intact, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w they|strong="H1931"\w* \w had|strong="H4264"\w* \w run|strong="H5127"\w* \w for|strong="H5315"\w* \w their|strong="H5800"\w* \w lives|strong="H5315"\w*.

\w When|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5375"\w* \w lepers|strong="H6879"\w* \w reached|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5375"\w* \w edge|strong="H7097"\w* \w of|strong="H4264"\w* \w the|strong="H5375"\w* \w camp|strong="H4264"\w*, \w they|strong="H8033"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* \w into|strong="H7725"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* tent \w to|strong="H5704"\w* eat \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w drink|strong="H8354"\w*. \w Then|strong="H5375"\w* \w they|strong="H8033"\w* \w carried|strong="H5375"\w* \w off|strong="H5375"\w* \w the|strong="H5375"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, \w and|strong="H3701"\w* clothing, \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w hid|strong="H2934"\w* \w them|strong="H7725"\w*. \w On|strong="H2091"\w* \w returning|strong="H7725"\w*, \w they|strong="H8033"\w* \w entered|strong="H5704"\w* another tent, \w carried|strong="H5375"\w* \w off|strong="H5375"\w* \w some|strong="H8033"\w* items \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w*, \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w hid|strong="H2934"\w* \w them|strong="H7725"\w*.

\w Finally|strong="H5704"\w*, \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w said|strong="H3651"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w one|strong="H2088"\w* \w another|strong="H7453"\w*, “\w We|strong="H3117"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w doing|strong="H6213"\w* \w what|strong="H2088"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w right|strong="H3651"\w*. \w Today|strong="H3117"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* good \w news|strong="H1309"\w*. \w If|strong="H3651"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w silent|strong="H2814"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w wait|strong="H2442"\w* \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* light, \w our|strong="H6213"\w* \w sin|strong="H5771"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w overtake|strong="H4672"\w* \w us|strong="H5046"\w*. \w Now|strong="H6258"\w*, \w therefore|strong="H3651"\w*, \w let|strong="H6258"\w* \w us|strong="H5046"\w* \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w tell|strong="H5046"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*’s \w household|strong="H1004"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H7121"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w went|strong="H5892"\w* \w and|strong="H6963"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w out|strong="H8033"\w* \w to|strong="H7121"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w gatekeepers|strong="H7778"\w* \w of|strong="H5892"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, \w saying|strong="H6963"\w*, “\w We|strong="H3588"\w* \w went|strong="H5892"\w* \w to|strong="H7121"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* Aramean \w camp|strong="H4264"\w* \w and|strong="H6963"\w* no \w one|strong="H3588"\w* \w was|strong="H5892"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w*—\w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* trace—\w only|strong="H3588"\w* tethered \w horses|strong="H5483"\w* \w and|strong="H6963"\w* \w donkeys|strong="H2543"\w*, \w and|strong="H6963"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w tents|strong="H4264"\w* \w were|strong="H1992"\w* intact.”

\w The|strong="H7121"\w* \w gatekeepers|strong="H7778"\w* \w shouted|strong="H7121"\w* \w the|strong="H7121"\w* news, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w it|strong="H7121"\w* \w was|strong="H4428"\w* \w reported|strong="H5046"\w* \w to|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H7121"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*’s \w household|strong="H1004"\w*.

\w So|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w got|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w night|strong="H3915"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w said|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w his|strong="H3045"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, “\w Let|strong="H4994"\w* \w me|strong="H4994"\w* \w tell|strong="H5046"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w what|strong="H3045"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* Arameans \w have|strong="H3045"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w us|strong="H4994"\w*. \w They|strong="H3588"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H5892"\w* starving, \w so|strong="H6213"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* \w left|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w camp|strong="H4264"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w hide|strong="H2247"\w* \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w*, thinking, ‘\w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w come|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w take|strong="H8610"\w* \w them|strong="H6213"\w* \w alive|strong="H2416"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* enter \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*.’”

\w But|strong="H7200"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H5650"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w replied|strong="H6030"\w*, “\w Please|strong="H4994"\w*, \w have|strong="H5650"\w* scouts \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w of|strong="H5650"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w horses|strong="H5483"\w* \w that|strong="H7200"\w* \w remain|strong="H7604"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* city. \w Their|strong="H3605"\w* plight \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w be|strong="H3478"\w* \w no|strong="H4480"\w* worse \w than|strong="H4480"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H3478"\w* \w left|strong="H7604"\w* \w here|strong="H2009"\w*. \w You|strong="H3605"\w* \w can|strong="H5650"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w that|strong="H7200"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w here|strong="H2009"\w* \w are|strong="H3478"\w* doomed. \w So|strong="H4480"\w* \w let|strong="H7971"\w* \w us|strong="H4994"\w* \w send|strong="H7971"\w* \w them|strong="H7971"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w find|strong="H3947"\w* \w out|strong="H7971"\w*.”

\w Then|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* scouts \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w* \w with|strong="H3212"\w* \w horses|strong="H5483"\w*, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w them|strong="H7971"\w* \w after|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* Aramean \w army|strong="H4264"\w*, saying, “\w Go|strong="H3212"\w* \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w*.”

\w And|strong="H7725"\w* \w they|strong="H5704"\w* tracked \w them|strong="H7725"\w* \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w far|strong="H5704"\w* \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w indeed|strong="H2009"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w whole|strong="H3605"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w was|strong="H4428"\w* \w littered|strong="H7993"\w* \w with|strong="H3212"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w clothing|strong="H3627"\w* \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w equipment|strong="H3627"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Arameans \w had|strong="H4428"\w* \w thrown|strong="H7993"\w* \w off|strong="H7993"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w haste|strong="H2648"\w*. \w So|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* scouts \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w told|strong="H5046"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*. Elisha’s Prophecy Fulfilled

\w Then|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w went|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* plundered \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w camp|strong="H4264"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* Arameans. \w It|strong="H1961"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w then|strong="H1961"\w* \w that|strong="H5971"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* seah \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w fine|strong="H5560"\w* \w flour|strong="H5560"\w* \w sold|strong="H3318"\w* \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w shekel|strong="H8255"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* two \w seahs|strong="H5429"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w barley|strong="H8184"\w* \w sold|strong="H3318"\w* \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w shekel|strong="H8255"\w*, according \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.
